Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 53rd overall pick, by Minnesota in 1966...
Injured on 7/21/1967 with a Inflamed Hip Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 6/10/1970 with a Bruised Hand, out for 2 days...
Had first career hit on 4/5/1974, off Jared Graham (PG)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/17/1974, off Nick Saez (SHP)...
Won World Championship with Minnesota in 1979...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1980, hitting .538 with 1 HR, 10 RBI...
Injured on 5/30/1982 with a Torn Rotator Cuff Muscle, out for full season...
Signed as a free agent by Malibu on 2/3/1983 to a 1-year deal worth $2,000,000 per year...
Injured on 9/24/1983 with a Pulled Hip Muscle, out for one week...
